Description:
A Brilliant Place To Start
So close to Westfield Doncaster that you can see it from the bottom of the driveway this ideally located 2 bedroom townhouse is one of only 4 and immediately impresses with its potential for investors or first home buyers. It also surprises with an unexpected layout which sees the very generous living room and kitchen with dining space situated on the upper level with the 2 robed bedrooms below. The kitchen offers ample bench space including breakfast bar, Chef cooking appliances, tiled splashback and plentiful storage while the dining space easily accommodates a full size table. The bathroom with both bath and shower separates the bedrooms and the lower level also includes the toilet and laundry which opens onto a courtyard. Presenting in good condition throughout, this property includes ducted heating plus a split system air conditioning unit in the living room, good carpets, exposed brick feature walls, balcony and a single auto garage.
Apart from being able to walk to Westfield Doncaster and access the numerous bus services available there, the location is within the zones for Doncaster Primary School and Doncaster Secondary College and allows easy access to Doncaster Park & Ride along with some of Melbourne’s major arterials including the Eastern Freeway.
